scripts.dev-old: yarn config set nmHoistingLimits 'workspaces' && yarn install && yarn config set nmHoistingLimits 'none' && rm -rf .aws-sam && overmind start
scripts.dev: yarn install && rm -rf .aws-sam && rm -rf ./node_modules/@common/ && (cd ../../common/types && yarn build) && (cd ../../common/util && yarn build) && cp -r ../../common/ ./node_modules/@common && overmind start
scripts.fix: rm -rf node_modules && yarn config set nmHoistingLimits 'none' && yarn install
